name: ARK (rukki_mika)
description: ARK is an isometric puzzle game created in 48 hours Gryf Jam 2018, whose theme was “Flat Earth”. The player has to rotate the cubic dices, so the point difference between adjacent planets equals 1. The game won the Audience Award at the jam. The graphics were designed by Wiktoria Fruba and the code was supplied by Mikołaj Dereszewski.
